attributes.action: Exempt double vaccinated Indians from quarantine upon arrival in UK
attributes.additional_details:
Astra zeneca vaccine developed in UK has been licenced for production in India. India made vaccine has been used in UK Gov vaccination programme.
Having uniform guidelines for people of both countries will facilitate travel and reduce inconvenience of individuals who are double vaccinated.
attributes.background: Double vaccinated individuals under UK Govt vaccination programme are exempt from quarantine after returning to UK from countries which are not on the red list. It includes individuals who have received Astra zeneca vaccine produced in India.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597491
